title: Unverified Smart Contract
description: Smart contract source code is not verified on the blockchain explorer

title: Excessive Owner Privileges
description: Contract owner has excessive privileges (mint, pause, upgrade without timelock)
condition: owner_privileges.mintable == true || owner_privileges.pausable == true || (owner_privileges.upgradable == true && owner_privileges.timelock == false)
remediation: Implement timelocks and minimize owner privileges

title: Centralization Risk
description: Protocol has single points of failure or centralized control
remediation: Implement multisig, timelocks, and decentralized governance

title: Liquidity Not Locked
description: Liquidity pool tokens are not locked in a timelock contract
remediation: Lock liquidity for at least 90 days in a timelock contract

title: Missing Security Audit
description: Smart contract has not been audited by a reputable security firm
remediation: Get a security audit from a reputable firm before launch

title: Rug Pull Risk Indicators
description: Multiple rug pull risk indicators present (high owner allocation, no locks, etc.)
remediation: Ensure fair token distribution and locked liquidity
